Component Library

Developers#

Component Contributors#

  • Sumeet Ingole - singole@redhat.com
  • Deepesh Nair - denair@redhat.com

Getting Started with Component Library#

GitHub Repo#

https://github.com/1-Platform/op-components

Usage#

One platform component library is a collection of web components which are built using lit-element, each component follows the red hat brand guideline. LitElement follows the Web Components standards, so your components will work with any framework.

The op component library has many packages which acts as a component.

Component creation

  • Go to https://github.com/1-Platform/op-components and fork this repository

  • Clone the forked repository

    git clone git@github.com:hybridx/op-components.git

  • Install the generator

    npm install -g yo
    npm install -g @one-platform/generator-opc-generator

  • Go to packages folder in the repository and generate your component

    yo @one-platform/opc-generator

Packages#

  • OP-Styles: Which includes the common style, which can be used in other components.

Quick Start Guide#

To Use the component from the library go packages in to GitHub Repo
